trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the application elements on which it is valid to apply an attribute.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to any application element.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to an assembly.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a class.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a constructor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a delegate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to an enumeration.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to an event.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a generic parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to an interface.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a module.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a return value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Attribute can be applied to a structure; that is, a value type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx$ xxxx xx$ x xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x
